title: Critical Thinking Enhancement Course Through Biology Inquiry-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Conducting inquiry-based learning activities in a mobile environment utilizing personal devices (BYOD), providing real-time interaction and feedback

learning_goals: Learners can generate three or more scientific questions and formulate hypotheses for a given biology scenario
Learners can write experimental procedures applying variable control methods through virtual lab design in mobile environments
Learners can analyze collected biological data to derive logical conclusions based on scientific evidence
Learners can provide two or more critical feedbacks on peers' experimental designs through peer review
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
